alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 9:43PM AKST until January 09 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SATURDAY TO 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western Prince of Wales Island. * WHEN...From 3 PM Saturday to 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow amounts could be higher in the higher terrain of the road system and in northern communities. There is a chance of freezing rain. A change to all rain is expected on Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area
